name: True Detective Solitaire 2
description:
A new case? The True Detective is already hot on the criminal's heels!

In the new Detective Solitaire, you're going to have to solve 120 puzzles – 120 unique card deals! Are you ready for exciting adventures and thrilling chases around the streets of a shadowy city? 12 new locations await you! Find the stolen gold, collect chains of cards, and find special golden cards to complete levels.

In the first part of the game, you proved that you are a True Detective! But the criminal underworld didn't disappear: a new villain has robbed a bank and stolen its gold! Rely on your skills of deduction, but be sure to take advantage of the wonders of modern science too: bonuses have been specially developed for this assignment – joker, shuffle and mulligan! Use them to complete levels faster and more easily!

But what about your fee? Don't worry! Complete special tasks and get over 15 golden trophies as a reward!

And if the True Detective wants to try out a more difficult case for size, select Professional difficulty mode and complete the levels again with new rules!

Sherlock Holmes himself would envy anyone who solves this incredible case! The mysterious adventures continue!

The new Detective Solitaire features:

- An entertaining solitaire for new players and experts alike!
- Make chains of cards, use bonuses, and get bonus rewards
- 12 locations, 120 levels and several difficulty modes
- For daring players, we offer special achievements and trophies
- A mysterious detective setting and high-quality graphics
- Original themed decks and card backs
- Beautiful music that doesn't distract from gameplay
